short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Vivir: new tab with a new Spanish word.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Learn a new word in Spanish every time you open a new tab.

Vivir teaches you Spanish instead of Chrome's default recently visited pages that show up on the new tab page.

Clean, simple interface with TTS (Spanish words to speech) support.
